rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports culling numbers and reason using neutral language.
The segment describes a future action ('will be killed') with numbers, which is Neutral for Q3.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports actions taken (killed birds) and reason but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a planned measure ('will be killed') and purpose ('in order to prevent the virus from spreading') without explicit reassurance.
